definition: a part of a building consisting of rooms that are partly or completely below the level of the ground
the things that a person owns, especially those that can be carried
a part of something larger; one of the offices or groups that form part of a large business organization
to try to make someone do something for you by giving them money, presents, or something else that they want
an injury or mark where the skin has not been broken but is darker in colour, often as a result of being hit by something
cruel, violent, and completely without feelings
